title: 17 Handcrafted Home Gifts Designers Adore
description: Discover why designers adore artisan gifts for the home. Explore 17 handcrafted pieces that add warmth, texture, and timeless beauty to any space.
author: Tahira
excerpt: Discover why designers adore artisan gifts for the home. Explore 17 handcrafted pieces that add warmth, texture, and timeless beauty to any space.
text: There’s something uniquely captivating about artisan-made home décor—each piece tells a story of craft, culture, and creativity that can’t be replicated. Designers love adding artisan items to homes because they bring character, warmth, and that “one-of-a-kind” charm. These handcrafted treasures don’t just fill a room; they elevate it, making it feel more personal, curated, and full of soul. From small accent pieces to statement furnishings, these 17 handcrafted items sourced from top shops like Uncommon Goods, Etsy, Wayfair, and specialty stores such as The Citizenry and Modern Artisans will infuse your space with authenticity and elegance. Let’s dive in to discover what makes these artisan items so beloved among designers and homeowners alike. 1. Handwoven Wall Tapestry Source: Etsy Imagine coming home to the cozy warmth of a beautifully crafted wall tapestry that instantly transforms your space. The Etsy‘s handwoven wall hangings are one-of-a-kind pieces, made with love and skill by artisans who weave each thread with traditional looms. These aren’t just decorations—they’re pieces of art with soul.  With earthy tones and unique patterns, these tapestries add depth and personality to any room, whether it’s a bohemian sanctuary or a modern minimalist corner. Hang one above your bed, or in your entryway, and see how it immediately softens the space and gives it a rich, textural feel. Where to buy: Etsy’s Wall Tapestries Collection 2. Handmade Ceramic Vases Source: Etsy There’s something so grounding about having a handmade ceramic vase in your space. These aren’t just any vases—they’re crafted by skilled artisans on Etsy who put care into every curve and finish.  Each one has its own unique personality, with slight variations in shape and glaze that make it feel authentically yours. Fill one with wildflowers, and dried branches, or let it stand alone as a sculptural piece on a shelf or coffee table. The simple act of placing a handcrafted vase in your home can bring a sense of calm, beauty, and connection to the artist who made it. Where to buy: Etsy’s Collection of Handmade Ceramic Vases 3. Artisan Wooden Serving Board Source: Uncommon Goods There’s no better way to host a gathering than with a gorgeous artisan wooden serving board from Uncommon Goods. Each board highlights the rich grain of sustainably sourced wood, giving it a unique look that’s as functional as it is beautiful.  Picture it: a delicious spread of cheeses, fruits, and charcuterie laid out on a smooth, organic wood slab—it’s as much a visual delight as it is tasty! When not in use, these boards make stunning kitchen décor, leaning against your backsplash or displayed on open shelves. It’s a piece that says “welcome” with style and warmth, crafted to last for years of special occasions and everyday enjoyment. Where to buy: Uncommon Goods’ Wooden Serving Boards 4. Hand-Thrown Pottery Bowls Source: Etsy Hand-thrown pottery bowls are more than just dishes—they’re small, everyday pieces of art that add character to your table. Each bowl from Etsy is shaped like a potter’s wheel, giving it a unique feel with subtle irregularities that make it special.  Perfect for serving up soups, salads, or even snacks, these bowls also work as decorative accents, lending that handcrafted charm wherever they’re placed. Their earthy colors and soft glazes make meals feel more personal and more thoughtful. Bringing one of these into your home feels like embracing a simpler, artful way of living, one where even the dishes carry a story. Where to buy: Etsy’s Hand-Thrown Pottery Bowls 5. Handwoven Textured Throw Pillows Source: Amazon There’s nothing like sinking into a couch filled with textured, cozy throw pillows. Lulu and Georgia’s handwoven pillows are not just soft; they’re works of art, carefully crafted by artisans who know how to combine comfort with beauty.  Whether you’re drawn to earthy neutrals or vibrant colors, these pillows are perfect for layering, adding that “collected” look to your sofa, bed, or favorite armchair. Each pillow has a unique texture, from chunky knots to delicate weaves, that makes it so inviting. It’s the kind of accent piece that doesn’t just look good—it makes your space feel like home. Where to buy: Lulu and Georgia’s Throw Pillow Collection 6. Natural Fiber Area Rugs Source: Wayfair If you’re looking for something that grounds a space with effortless style, a natural fiber rug from Wayfair might just be the answer. Handwoven from eco-friendly materials like jute, sisal, or seagrass, these rugs add a warm, natural touch that complements almost any décor. Their subtle, earthy tones don’t steal the spotlight, yet they bring an inviting, lived-in feel that makes a room look complete. Plus, these rugs are tough, so they’re great for high-traffic areas like living rooms or entryways. It’s a simple, stylish way to add texture and warmth underfoot while keeping your design naturally chic. Where to buy: Wayfair’s Natural Fiber Rug Collection 7. Handblown Glass Tumblers Source: Etsy There’s something special about sipping from a handblown glass tumbler. These beauties from Etsy aren’t just drinkware—they’re handcrafted pieces of art. Each tumbler is made by skilled glassblowers, giving it unique shapes, colors, and textures that make every sip feel like a small luxury.  Whether you’re serving up water, wine, or a fancy cocktail, these tumblers bring an elegant touch to the table. The slight variations in each glass remind you of the artisanal skill that went into making it, and they’re sure to spark conversation with guests. A true joy to use and admire. Where to buy: Etsy’s Handblown Glass Collection 8. Macramé Plant Hangers Source: Amazon If you’re tight on floor space but still want some greenery, macramé plant hangers from Amazon are a perfect solution. Made from natural cotton rope, each hanger is meticulously knotted to cradle your favorite plants, bringing a cozy, bohemian vibe to your space.  Hang one by a sunny window or in a quiet corner, and watch it transform your room with a touch of nature and style. These hangers work especially well for trailing plants, adding life and color at eye level. It’s an easy way to bring a little nature indoors while keeping things stylish and space-efficient. Where to buy: Amazon’s Macramé Plant Hangers 9. Handmade Wool Throws Source: Jennifer Adam’s Imagine curling up in a luxuriously soft, handmade wool throw after a long day. The Jeniffer Adam’s wool throws are crafted with care by skilled artisans who use sustainable, high-quality wool for that perfect balance of warmth and breathability.  Each throw has a distinct pattern and texture, from chunky knits to finer weaves, and they’re all finished with attention to detail that makes them look as good as they feel.  Drape one over your sofa or bed, and you’ll instantly add a cozy, inviting vibe that’s hard to beat. These throws aren’t just functional—they’re stylish, artisanal pieces that you’ll want to keep close all winter. Where to buy: Jennifer Adam’s Decorative Throw Wool  10. Handcrafted Candle Holders Source: Wayfair If you love a little glow, Wayfair’s candle holders are a must-have. These handcrafted pieces are polished to perfection, reflecting the warm light from a candle and adding a soft, romantic ambiance to any room.  Whether you place them as a centerpiece or scatter them around for a cozy vibe, they bring a timeless elegance that works beautifully with both modern and rustic styles. The warm tones of the copper are especially lovely in the evening light, giving off a sophisticated yet homey feel. These aren’t just candle holders—they’re little pieces of art that enhance your space in a subtle, beautiful way. Where to buy: Wayfair’s Copper Candle Holders 11. Handmade Rocking Chair Source: Made Trade A handcrafted rocking chair from Made Trade is more than just a piece of furniture—it’s a statement of quality, tradition, and comfort. This rocking chair, made by skilled artisans, features an elegantly simple design that beautifully blends rustic charm with modern lines.  Crafted with sustainably sourced wood, it has a natural finish that highlights the organic grain patterns, adding depth and texture to any space. Rocking chairs have a timeless appeal, offering a cozy spot for reading or relaxing, and their gentle movement adds an element of calm to your environment. This chair is perfect for a living room, nursery, or bedroom corner, becoming not only a functional piece but a beloved part of your home. Where to buy: Made Trade’s Handmade Rocking Chair 12. Handmade Jute Rug Source: Made Trade Jute rugs from Made Trade bring natural elegance to any room with their earthy tones and soft textures. These rugs are handwoven from jute—a durable, sustainable fiber that’s perfect for high-traffic areas. Their subtle patterns and warm, neutral shades make them easy to pair with various decor styles, from modern minimalist to bohemian.  Jute’s natural fibers feel soft underfoot, while its organic look brings a sense of calm and grounding to your space. Perfect for a living room, bedroom, or entryway, jute rugs also add a layer of texture, making them an excellent choice for anyone wanting to introduce more depth and character into their home. Where to buy: Made Trade’s Jute Rugs 13. Light Taupe Diyama Vase  Source: Jennifer Adams The Light Taupe Diyama Vase from Jennifer Adams offers a subtle, refined elegance that effortlessly complements any decor style. With its soft taupe color and modern, minimalist design, this vase feels both sophisticated and calming. It’s made with a matte finish that adds texture and a touch of luxury, making it perfect for displaying fresh flowers, or dried botanicals, or simply as a standalone statement piece.  This vase is handcrafted with care, ensuring quality and a personal touch that mass-produced items often lack. Whether placed on a dining table, console, or bookshelf, the Diyama Vase adds an understated, natural beauty to any room. Where to buy: Jennifer Adams’ Light Taupe Diyama Vase 14. Handcrafted Terracotta Planters Source: Etsy Bring a bit of the outdoors in with handcrafted terracotta planters from Etsy. Each planter is carefully molded and fired, showing off the natural reddish-brown hue of terracotta that looks stunning with all kinds of greenery.  These pots are ideal for both small succulents and larger indoor plants, and they give off a rustic charm that pairs well with boho, farmhouse, or even contemporary decor. Each one has subtle variations, lending a unique personality to your plant collection, and they create a beautifully warm, earthy feel in any room. Where to buy: Etsy’s Handcrafted Terracotta Planters 15. Mugs and Coasters Source: Modern Artisan Modern Artisans’ collection of handcrafted mugs and coasters offers an inviting way to enjoy your daily rituals. Each mug is made by hand in the USA, featuring unique glazes and designs that make each piece truly one-of-a-kind. These mugs aren’t just for coffee or tea; they’re little pieces of art that add personality to your kitchen or office space.  Paired with matching handmade coasters, they elevate your coffee table with a touch of charm and artistry. The coasters are not only functional but also visually pleasing, protecting your surfaces while adding color and texture. Whether gifting or collecting for yourself, these mugs and coasters bring warmth and craft into your daily routine. Where to buy: Modern Artisans’ Mugs and Coasters 16. Natural Linen Table Runners Source: Lulu and Georgia A natural linen table runner from Lulu and Georgia brings a soft, relaxed elegance to your dining area. Linen is naturally textured and breathable, giving your table a casual yet refined look that’s perfect for both everyday meals and special occasions.  Each runner has a beautiful drape and subtle color variations that feel rustic yet modern. Paired with candles, fresh flowers, or minimal tableware, this piece completes the table with effortless grace. Plus, linen softens with each wash, making it more beautiful over time—a true investment piece for any home. Where to buy: Lulu and Georgia’s Natural Linen Table Runners 17. Carved Wood Side Table – The Citizenry Source: The Citizenry The Carved Wood Side Table from The Citizenry is a stunning example of hand-carved craftsmanship. Each table is made by skilled artisans in Oaxaca, Mexico, and takes several days to complete.  With its organic shape and beautifully grained wood, this side table brings warmth and a natural element into any space, offering both function and art. Designers love this piece because it blends seamlessly with both modern and traditional decor, adding an earthy, handcrafted touch that feels timeless.  Where to buy: The Citizenry’s Talu Carved Wood Side Table Finishing Notes At Home Designing, we believe that your living space should reflect your personality and taste, and nothing achieves that quite like artisan craftsmanship. Whether you’re looking for sustainable materials, luxurious textures, or that perfect piece to finish off your room, handcrafted items are the key to creating an environment that feels authentically you. As you explore the world of artisan gifts and decor, don’t forget that the beauty lies not only in the object itself but in the process of its creation. These carefully curated pieces bring warmth, character, and a bit of soul into your home, transforming even the most ordinary spaces into something extraordinary.
html:
There’s something uniquely captivating about artisan-made home décor—each piece tells a story of craft, culture, and creativity that can’t be replicated. Designers love adding artisan items to homes because they bring character, warmth, and that “one-of-a-kind” charm. These handcrafted treasures don’t just fill a room; they elevate it, making it feel more personal, curated, and full of soul.

From small accent pieces to statement furnishings, these 17 handcrafted items sourced from top shops like Uncommon Goods, Etsy, Wayfair, and specialty stores such as The Citizenry and Modern Artisans will infuse your space with authenticity and elegance. Let’s dive in to discover what makes these artisan items so beloved among designers and homeowners alike.

1. Handwoven Wall Tapestry

Imagine coming home to the cozy warmth of a beautifully crafted wall tapestry that instantly transforms your space. The Etsy‘s handwoven wall hangings are one-of-a-kind pieces, made with love and skill by artisans who weave each thread with traditional looms. These aren’t just decorations—they’re pieces of art with soul. 

With earthy tones and unique patterns, these tapestries add depth and personality to any room, whether it’s a bohemian sanctuary or a modern minimalist corner. Hang one above your bed, or in your entryway, and see how it immediately softens the space and gives it a rich, textural feel.

Where to buy: Etsy’s Wall Tapestries Collection

2. Handmade Ceramic Vases

There’s something so grounding about having a handmade ceramic vase in your space. These aren’t just any vases—they’re crafted by skilled artisans on Etsy who put care into every curve and finish. 

Each one has its own unique personality, with slight variations in shape and glaze that make it feel authentically yours. Fill one with wildflowers, and dried branches, or let it stand alone as a sculptural piece on a shelf or coffee table. The simple act of placing a handcrafted vase in your home can bring a sense of calm, beauty, and connection to the artist who made it.

Where to buy: Etsy’s Collection of Handmade Ceramic Vases

3. Artisan Wooden Serving Board

There’s no better way to host a gathering than with a gorgeous artisan wooden serving board from Uncommon Goods. Each board highlights the rich grain of sustainably sourced wood, giving it a unique look that’s as functional as it is beautiful. 

Picture it: a delicious spread of cheeses, fruits, and charcuterie laid out on a smooth, organic wood slab—it’s as much a visual delight as it is tasty! When not in use, these boards make stunning kitchen décor, leaning against your backsplash or displayed on open shelves. It’s a piece that says “welcome” with style and warmth, crafted to last for years of special occasions and everyday enjoyment.

Where to buy: Uncommon Goods’ Wooden Serving Boards

4. Hand-Thrown Pottery Bowls

Hand-thrown pottery bowls are more than just dishes—they’re small, everyday pieces of art that add character to your table. Each bowl from Etsy is shaped like a potter’s wheel, giving it a unique feel with subtle irregularities that make it special.

 Perfect for serving up soups, salads, or even snacks, these bowls also work as decorative accents, lending that handcrafted charm wherever they’re placed. Their earthy colors and soft glazes make meals feel more personal and more thoughtful. Bringing one of these into your home feels like embracing a simpler, artful way of living, one where even the dishes carry a story.

Where to buy: Etsy’s Hand-Thrown Pottery Bowls

5. Handwoven Textured Throw Pillows

There’s nothing like sinking into a couch filled with textured, cozy throw pillows. Lulu and Georgia’s handwoven pillows are not just soft; they’re works of art, carefully crafted by artisans who know how to combine comfort with beauty. 

Whether you’re drawn to earthy neutrals or vibrant colors, these pillows are perfect for layering, adding that “collected” look to your sofa, bed, or favorite armchair. Each pillow has a unique texture, from chunky knots to delicate weaves, that makes it so inviting. It’s the kind of accent piece that doesn’t just look good—it makes your space feel like home.

Where to buy: Lulu and Georgia’s Throw Pillow Collection

6. Natural Fiber Area Rugs

If you’re looking for something that grounds a space with effortless style, a natural fiber rug from Wayfair might just be the answer. Handwoven from eco-friendly materials like jute, sisal, or seagrass, these rugs add a warm, natural touch that complements almost any décor. Their subtle, earthy tones don’t steal the spotlight, yet they bring an inviting, lived-in feel that makes a room look complete. Plus, these rugs are tough, so they’re great for high-traffic areas like living rooms or entryways. It’s a simple, stylish way to add texture and warmth underfoot while keeping your design naturally chic.

Where to buy: Wayfair’s Natural Fiber Rug Collection

7. Handblown Glass Tumblers

There’s something special about sipping from a handblown glass tumbler. These beauties from Etsy aren’t just drinkware—they’re handcrafted pieces of art. Each tumbler is made by skilled glassblowers, giving it unique shapes, colors, and textures that make every sip feel like a small luxury.

 Whether you’re serving up water, wine, or a fancy cocktail, these tumblers bring an elegant touch to the table. The slight variations in each glass remind you of the artisanal skill that went into making it, and they’re sure to spark conversation with guests. A true joy to use and admire.

Where to buy: Etsy’s Handblown Glass Collection

8. Macramé Plant Hangers

If you’re tight on floor space but still want some greenery, macramé plant hangers from Amazon are a perfect solution. Made from natural cotton rope, each hanger is meticulously knotted to cradle your favorite plants, bringing a cozy, bohemian vibe to your space. 

Hang one by a sunny window or in a quiet corner, and watch it transform your room with a touch of nature and style. These hangers work especially well for trailing plants, adding life and color at eye level. It’s an easy way to bring a little nature indoors while keeping things stylish and space-efficient.

Where to buy: Amazon’s Macramé Plant Hangers

9. Handmade Wool Throws

Imagine curling up in a luxuriously soft, handmade wool throw after a long day. The Jeniffer Adam’s wool throws are crafted with care by skilled artisans who use sustainable, high-quality wool for that perfect balance of warmth and breathability. 

Each throw has a distinct pattern and texture, from chunky knits to finer weaves, and they’re all finished with attention to detail that makes them look as good as they feel. 

Drape one over your sofa or bed, and you’ll instantly add a cozy, inviting vibe that’s hard to beat. These throws aren’t just functional—they’re stylish, artisanal pieces that you’ll want to keep close all winter.

Where to buy: Jennifer Adam’s Decorative Throw Wool 

10. Handcrafted Candle Holders

If you love a little glow, Wayfair’s candle holders are a must-have. These handcrafted pieces are polished to perfection, reflecting the warm light from a candle and adding a soft, romantic ambiance to any room. 

Whether you place them as a centerpiece or scatter them around for a cozy vibe, they bring a timeless elegance that works beautifully with both modern and rustic styles. The warm tones of the copper are especially lovely in the evening light, giving off a sophisticated yet homey feel. These aren’t just candle holders—they’re little pieces of art that enhance your space in a subtle, beautiful way.

Where to buy: Wayfair’s Copper Candle Holders

11. Handmade Rocking Chair

A handcrafted rocking chair from Made Trade is more than just a piece of furniture—it’s a statement of quality, tradition, and comfort. This rocking chair, made by skilled artisans, features an elegantly simple design that beautifully blends rustic charm with modern lines. 

Crafted with sustainably sourced wood, it has a natural finish that highlights the organic grain patterns, adding depth and texture to any space. Rocking chairs have a timeless appeal, offering a cozy spot for reading or relaxing, and their gentle movement adds an element of calm to your environment. This chair is perfect for a living room, nursery, or bedroom corner, becoming not only a functional piece but a beloved part of your home.

Where to buy: Made Trade’s Handmade Rocking Chair

12. Handmade Jute Rug

Jute rugs from Made Trade bring natural elegance to any room with their earthy tones and soft textures. These rugs are handwoven from jute—a durable, sustainable fiber that’s perfect for high-traffic areas. Their subtle patterns and warm, neutral shades make them easy to pair with various decor styles, from modern minimalist to bohemian. 

Jute’s natural fibers feel soft underfoot, while its organic look brings a sense of calm and grounding to your space. Perfect for a living room, bedroom, or entryway, jute rugs also add a layer of texture, making them an excellent choice for anyone wanting to introduce more depth and character into their home.

Where to buy: Made Trade’s Jute Rugs

13. Light Taupe Diyama Vase 

The Light Taupe Diyama Vase from Jennifer Adams offers a subtle, refined elegance that effortlessly complements any decor style. With its soft taupe color and modern, minimalist design, this vase feels both sophisticated and calming. It’s made with a matte finish that adds texture and a touch of luxury, making it perfect for displaying fresh flowers, or dried botanicals, or simply as a standalone statement piece. 

This vase is handcrafted with care, ensuring quality and a personal touch that mass-produced items often lack. Whether placed on a dining table, console, or bookshelf, the Diyama Vase adds an understated, natural beauty to any room.

Where to buy: Jennifer Adams’ Light Taupe Diyama Vase

14. Handcrafted Terracotta Planters

Bring a bit of the outdoors in with handcrafted terracotta planters from Etsy. Each planter is carefully molded and fired, showing off the natural reddish-brown hue of terracotta that looks stunning with all kinds of greenery. 

These pots are ideal for both small succulents and larger indoor plants, and they give off a rustic charm that pairs well with boho, farmhouse, or even contemporary decor. Each one has subtle variations, lending a unique personality to your plant collection, and they create a beautifully warm, earthy feel in any room.

Where to buy: Etsy’s Handcrafted Terracotta Planters

15. Mugs and Coasters

Modern Artisans’ collection of handcrafted mugs and coasters offers an inviting way to enjoy your daily rituals. Each mug is made by hand in the USA, featuring unique glazes and designs that make each piece truly one-of-a-kind. These mugs aren’t just for coffee or tea; they’re little pieces of art that add personality to your kitchen or office space. 

Paired with matching handmade coasters, they elevate your coffee table with a touch of charm and artistry. The coasters are not only functional but also visually pleasing, protecting your surfaces while adding color and texture. Whether gifting or collecting for yourself, these mugs and coasters bring warmth and craft into your daily routine.

Where to buy: Modern Artisans’ Mugs and Coasters

16. Natural Linen Table Runners

A natural linen table runner from Lulu and Georgia brings a soft, relaxed elegance to your dining area. Linen is naturally textured and breathable, giving your table a casual yet refined look that’s perfect for both everyday meals and special occasions. 

Each runner has a beautiful drape and subtle color variations that feel rustic yet modern. Paired with candles, fresh flowers, or minimal tableware, this piece completes the table with effortless grace. Plus, linen softens with each wash, making it more beautiful over time—a true investment piece for any home.

Where to buy: Lulu and Georgia’s Natural Linen Table Runners

17. Carved Wood Side Table – The Citizenry

The Carved Wood Side Table from The Citizenry is a stunning example of hand-carved craftsmanship. Each table is made by skilled artisans in Oaxaca, Mexico, and takes several days to complete. 

With its organic shape and beautifully grained wood, this side table brings warmth and a natural element into any space, offering both function and art. Designers love this piece because it blends seamlessly with both modern and traditional decor, adding an earthy, handcrafted touch that feels timeless. 

Where to buy: The Citizenry’s Talu Carved Wood Side Table

Finishing Notes

At Home Designing, we believe that your living space should reflect your personality and taste, and nothing achieves that quite like artisan craftsmanship. Whether you’re looking for sustainable materials, luxurious textures, or that perfect piece to finish off your room, handcrafted items are the key to creating an environment that feels authentically you.

As you explore the world of artisan gifts and decor, don’t forget that the beauty lies not only in the object itself but in the process of its creation. These carefully curated pieces bring warmth, character, and a bit of soul into your home, transforming even the most ordinary spaces into something extraordinary.
